review: this movie taken in awesome story line, the rating has to go high, this movie speaks actual reality happening today, the actor went beyond his perfection in role, songs beat high to speak the reality, yes we need to see some section of society which went in crimes in police custody, we need more laws and regulations which make the inequity vanish from society, its one of best movie by bhatt sahab, from my movie will touch 4/5 ratings, i request the people of today's world watch this awesome movie.
